availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Henry Conder (Owen County clerk and CSA soldier)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, clerk and Confederate soldier. Kentucky native. Son of David Conder and Somerville R. Conder. Clerk in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, Owenton, p. 223.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, Owenton, p. 283B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Owen County, KY, July 1863, p. 73 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Compiled Service Records of Confederate Soldiers who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky, NARA RG 109, Microfilm Series M319, Roll 0022.
Find A Grave, "William Henry ‘Chip’ Conder (1840-1899)," Memorial #16601696, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/16601696 (accessed February 25, 2020).
Find A Grave, "Somerville Conder (1818-1849)," Memorial #74215073, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/74215073 (accessed February 25, 2020).
